EXIFAUTOTRAN(1)          User Commands          EXIFAUTOTRAN(1)





NAME
       exifautotran - Transforms Exif files so that Orientation
       becomes 1

DESCRIPTION
       exifautotran [list of files]

       Take a list of files as  input  and  transform  then  in
       place so that the Orientation becomes 1.

AUTHOR
           Guido Vollbeding <guido@jpegclub.org>

SEE ALSO
       jpegtran(1) jpegexiforient(1)



exifautotran             February 2005          EXIFAUTOTRAN(1)
